item.name: Babszüret
item.comment: It's just simply fun every time, no matter how many people we play it with. :)

item.name: Bohnanza Erweiterungs-Set (Revised Edition)
item.comment: Good expansion, but the best is still to play without it.

item.name: Bohnanza: La Isla Bohnita
item.comment: This has the same rating for me, like most of the Bohnanza expansions. It makes the game a little bit more challenging, but doesn't make it more interesting.

item.name: Bohnaparte
item.comment: Played twice. Tried to like. Didn't work.

item.name: Bohnröschen
item.comment: Some extra challenge; we had some fun with it.

item.name: Carcassonne
item.comment: I love it, but never play without expansions. Otherwise it's too short for us.

item.name: Carcassonne: Expansion 1 – Inns & Cathedrals
item.comment: This made Carc a tiny little bit more challenging.

item.name: Carcassonne: Expansion 2 – Traders & Builders
item.comment: I like this expansion the most (from what I tried). Sometimes the result is totally change by the tokens.

item.name: Carcassonne: The Princess & the Dragon
item.comment: We usually play the friendly version - if it's avoidable, the dragon doesn't eat the meeples. I know, it's not really geek-like, but we play a lot with non-gamers and this is the best way to avoid conflicts. :)

item.name: Carcassonne: The Tower
item.comment: I just hate it. We only use the tiles to make the game longer, but the towers are just cobweb collectors in the box. :D

item.name: Catan
item.comment: Kind of 'love at first sight' although sometimes the luck factor can ruin it quite a bit.

item.name: Catan Histories: Settlers of America – Trails to Rails
Escape: The Curse of the Temple
Felix: The Cat in the Sack
Galaxy of D
item.comment: Nice game, we gave it a try, we played it a few times, we liked it, but we don't play print-and-plays too often.

item.name: Golden Horn: Von Venedig nach Konstantinopel
Der goldene Kompass: Spiel zum Film
In the Year of the Dragon
Journey to the Center of the Earth
Kahuna
item.comment: It just makes me frustrated. After the first turn it's always decided, who wins the game. And it's usually not me...

item.name: Keltis
item.comment: Although I'm not really an abstract player, I find this game fun.

item.name: Knights
item.comment: 1500 Ft (Bontott, kétszer játszott, hibátlan)

item.name: Last Night on Earth: The Zombie Game
Legacy: The Testament of Duke de Crecy
Livingstone
item.comment: We wanted to leave the game on the table halfway through, but we didn't, just because we respect games... It's beautiful, but I don't think, I would ever play it again.

item.name: Memory
item.comment: Ravensburger Deutschland

item.name: Memory
item.comment: Ravensburger History of Art

item.name: Memory
item.comment: Ravensburger Jubileumi kiadás

item.name: Monopoly: Here and Now – The World Edition
item.comment: I know, this 4 is a little bit high, but I have to play it sometimes with kids. :D It's still a little bit better, than the old paper money editions.

item.name: The New Era: Spiel 2011 Promo Pack
Panic Station: Survival Kit Mini Expansion
Project Kells: Sacred Hill, High Kings of Tara & Poisoned Chalice
Race for the Galaxy: The Gathering Storm
Railways of the World: The Card Game
Reef Encounter
item.comment: 7000 Ft (Bontott, nem játszott, hibátlan)

item.name: Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island
item.comment: Wow. It's just simply... wow.

item.name: Rock the Beat
item.comment: Don't sit down to play with me, I'm unbeatable! :D

item.name: Samarkand: Routes to Riches
item.comment: 7000 Ft (bontott, egyszer sem játszott, hibátlan, magyar kiadás)

item.name: Space Hulk: Death Angel – The Card Game
StarCraft: The Board Game – Brood War Expansion
Stone Age
item.comment: I don't know... I know it with my brain, that it's a very good game, but my soul somehow doesn't want to realize it. :D Although, there is too much luck for me, I never say no to play.

item.name: Through the Ages: A Story of Civilization
Thurn and Taxis: All Roads Lead to Rome
Thurn and Taxis: Power and Glory
Ticket to Ride Map Collection: Volume 1 – Team Asia & Legendary Asia
Ticket to Ride: The Card Game
Ubongo: Duel
item.comment: Never played the basic game, but we loved this with my boyfriend very much.

item.name: Winter
item.comment: With this expansion 51st State finally feels complete. The game became even more balanced, and it's long enough to enjoy our built up civilization. It's definitely a 10.

item.name: The Witcher: The Adventure Card Game
Zombie in my Pocket
item.comment: I get this Zombie sometimes out of my Pocket, when I'm really bored. :)
